altername_name: 合金装备 掌上行动
name: Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops Plus
overview: Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops Plus is a standalone addition to last year's award winning stealth action title of the same name. Focusing on a portable multiplayer experience, players will be able to enjoy more maps, more missions, and recruit a talented crew of war heroes for battling real opponents in online arenas.
